name: Willow Mills Mall
description:
Put on your checkered belts and play some MCR on your iPod Nano, because it's a Friday night in 2007 and you are going to the mall with your best friend. 

Will you buy an ironic wristband or will you steal samples from the food court? Will you make fun of preps in Hollister or will you meet internet royalty? Will you find love, or will you become the pariah of the Willow Mills Mall social scene? 

Game is in development - uploaded for testing and suggestions.
So far 3 routes are completed with good endings but other endings/choices are still being worked on. 

What I am working on:
More eligible bachelors/bachelorettes!
Better artwork/more cg!
Multiple endings and choices that impact the story!

This is my first game so I am learning how to code python on my own, so bear with me if there are bugs or errors!

Feedback appreciated!!
